preface.title: About This Manual
preface.para: This manual offers an introduction to setting up and managing virtualization with &kvm; (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) and &xen; on &productname;. The first part introduces the different virtualization solutions by describing their requirements, their installations and &suse;'s support status. The second part deals with managing &vmguest;s and &vmhost;s with &libvirt;. The following parts describe topics that are both hypervisor independent, or relate directly &kvm; and &xen; solutions.
